name: Blue Cheese, Lunar Descent
description:
You play as the last astro-driller willing to work for a insane space commander.

There’s cheese inside that moon, he can feel it. And you’re going to get it for him.

WASD or Arrow Key to Move Spacebar to throw objects

Keep the generator full of gas to descend (the fuller the tank the faster you move).

Repair the various machines on the drill ( if they break, you permanently burn more fuel).

You can throw objects at enemies to get rid of them.

Created by clemonades in 48hrs

Art/code/music/sound - clemonades.
